pages.text: "A machine used to crush ingots into their dust counterparts, as well as perform many other operations."$(p)The crusher, as it name implies, crushes stuff. Most of it recipes are crushing items/blocks to their dust/crushed counterparts. For example, ingots would get

crushed into their dust counterparts. $(p)The crusher also produces bio-fuel from crushing plant matter. Different plants yield different amount of bio-fuel. The bio-fuel can be then used as an Infuse Type or for a Bio-Generator (from Mekanism: Generators) to produce power. $(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)

pages.title: Ore Processing
pages.text: The Crusher is part of third step to ore processing. Working alongside with a $(l:purification_chamber)Purification Chamber$(/l), ores will yield 3x as much. See Ore Processing (category) for more information about Mekanism's Ore Processing.
